identity.name: VRH Buildcon
identity.mission: To merge the solidity of construction with the elegance of luxury design.

headings.usage: All section titles, hero text, and major calls to action. Use tracking-tight for sizes above 32px.

body.usage: Paragraphs, navigation, buttons, and UI elements.

rules: Use Gold (#D4AF37) sparingly for CTAs, borders, and key highlights.
Backgrounds must be deep black (#050505) or very dark grey (#121212), never pure white.
Text on dark backgrounds must be White (#FFFFFF) or Light Grey (#A1A1AA).
Avoid gradients for main backgrounds; use subtle noise or grain textures instead.

layout_strategies.spacing: Generous. Use p-12 to p-24 for section padding.

sections.hero: Full-screen immersive with video/image background and gold typography overlay.
sections.services: Asymmetric grid (Bento) highlighting different services with distinct visual weight.
sections.projects: Masonry layout with category filters. Images must be high-res and zoom on hover.
sections.testimonials: Horizontal scroll or large quote cards with gold accents.
sections.contact: Split layout: Map/Info on one side, Dark Glass form on the other.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black hover:bg-[#B5952F] rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest font-bold px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300
buttons.secondary: border border-[#D4AF37] text-[#D4AF37] hover:bg-[#D4AF37] hover:text-black rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest px-8 py-4 transition-all duration-300

cards.style: bg-[#121212] border border-[#27272A] hover:border-[#D4AF37]/50 transition-all duration-300
cards.hover_effect: Slight lift (-translate-y-1) and shadow-lg on hover.

inputs.style: bg-[#0A0A0A] border border-[#27272A] focus:border-[#D4AF37] text-white rounded-none h-12

navigation.style: Fixed glassmorphism (backdrop-blur-md bg-black/70) with gold active states.

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on dark backgrounds to prevent banding and add 'film' quality.
visual_enhancers.borders: 1px solid borders in dark grey (#27272A) to define structure.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Soft, diffuse shadows for depth (shadow-2xl black/50).

motion.reveal: Staggered fade-up animations for text and images.
motion.hover: Images scale up (1.05) on hover; Text color shifts to gold.

hero_background.description: Construction cranes silhouette against sunset - evokes 'Building Dreams'

services_interiors.description: Luxury marble and wood bathroom interior

services_construction.description: Silhouette of tower crane - represents heavy construction

abstract_texture.description: Zigzag architectural pattern - good for section backgrounds

project_2.description: Construction site at sunset - Building Project

instructions_to_main_agent: THEME SETUP: Force Dark Mode. In tailwind.config.js, extend colors with the palette provided above.
COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn for complex interactions (Forms, Dialogs) but style them with the 'Jewel & Luxury' palette (No default slate/zinc).
LAYOUT: Do NOT use standard Bootstrap columns. Use the 'Bento Grid' strategy for the Services and Portfolio sections.
NAVBAR: Create a floating glass navbar. It should be transparent at the top and become glass (backdrop-blur) on scroll.
FOOTER: Massive footer with 'VRH' in huge typography (text-[15vw]) at the bottom.
FORMS: Style inputs with square edges (rounded-none) and gold focus borders.
ANIMATION: Use 'framer-motion' for scroll reveals. Text should slide up and fade in.
IMAGES: Use the provided image URLs. Do NOT use placeholders.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop': No generic centered layouts, no purple/teal gradients.
Dark colors must be solid or subtle noise, NOT gradients.
Use 2-3x more spacing than typical designs.
